title: A Day in Pacific Rim
brief_description: A camera with a painterly approach acquaints its audience with Pacific Rim National Park, located on Vancouver Island, British Columbia. Giant treescapes, drooping moss and the stunningly beautiful ocean provide breathtaking material for an eager eye. A film without words.
